QuestData.Title: What Is This Place?
QuestData.Description: <Pip's helm gives you a slight jolt.>$B$BWhat is this place? It looks like they're doing something terrible to that nether dragon. The energy is being siphoned from the creature into that lady! We need to stop this ritual!$B$BKill Corla to get past this hall!
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: There's no time to waste! Raz needs our help!
QuestData.RewardText: <Finkle's helm crackles with static.>$B$BWe haven't got much time. Raz looked injured. If we get to him in time there might be a chance that I can turn him back into a regular orc!$B$B<You feel a sharp pain in the back of your head and hear the jingling of coins.>$B$BSorry about that. I figured I'd send through some gold - for your troubles and all that...
